channel.title: Versatility | 24x7 | Customs | Perfect Combat | ECO | Custom Bosses
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cmc26wS.png[/img] [CENTER][FONT=Impact][SIZE=7]VERSATILITY[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT=Arial Black][B]Credit to Sky O.o + Matt[/B][/FONT] [SIZE=5]Versatility is a ECO / PvP Based Server![/SIZE]
[URL=http://"http://www.versatility-rs.com/"]www.versatility-rs.com[/URL]
[url=http://www.versatility-rs.com/versatility.jar]http://www.versatility-rs.com/versatility.jar[/url]
[B]Welcome to Versatility, We are a new Eco / PvP Based server that's popped up on the radar! There is many things about Versatility that makes it iconic such as : Custom Rares, Custom Weapons, Custom Armours. Corporeal Beast, Tormented Demons, King Black Dragon, Barrelchest, Kalphite Queen, Bank tabs are flawless,Chaos Elemental, Bork, Ice Strykewyrms, Avatar of Creation, Avatar of Destruction, Daily Tasks, Achievement system, Completionest cape + Max Cape, Boss Pets, Perfect Switching incliding comat, Amazing PvE Drop rate, and it's relativley easy to level, some servers it takes longer to level than to grow a beard as a baby! There's much much more ingame! but the rest is upto you to find! so jump in! and explore Versatility!
Safe Adventures, Versatility[/center] [/B] [CENTER]Some Media, Just temporary for now
Donor Shop 1! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5nKylWX.png[/img]
Donor Shop 2! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XxK1eko.png[/img]
Corporal Beast fully working! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/odCzx1N.png[/img]
Some Custom Bosses! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5b82oqJ.png[/img]
Home! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sF5V89z.jpg[/img][/CENTER]

[B]Welcome to Versatility,
We are a new Eco / PvP Based server that’s popped up on the radar!
There is many things about Versatility that makes it iconic such as :
Custom Rares, Custom Weapons, Custom Armours.
Corporeal Beast, Tormented Demons, King Black Dragon, Barrelchest, Kalphite Queen, Bank tabs are flawless,Chaos Elemental, Bork, Ice Strykewyrms, Avatar of Creation, Avatar of Destruction, Daily Tasks, Achievement system, Completionest cape + Max Cape, Boss Pets,
Perfect Switching incliding comat, Amazing PvE Drop rate, and it’s relativley easy to level, some servers it takes longer to level than to grow a beard as a baby!
There’s much much more ingame! but the rest is upto you to find! so jump in! and explore Versatility!

Safe Adventures,
Versatility[/center]
